title: Mango Salsa - Taste the Tropical Side of Mexico!
directions: Mix all ingredients and refrigerate overnight to enhance flavors. Serve with tortilla chips or on top of carnitas.
ingredients: 1 cups ripe seeded tomatoes, coarsely chopped
1/2 teaspoon of salt (use more if needed)
1 serrano chili, seeded and veins removed, finely diced
